original_text: Cursed be he that lieth with his sister, the daughter of his father, or the daughter of his mother. And all the people shall say, Amen.
korean_text: 그의 자매 곧 그의 아버지의 딸이나 어머니의 딸과 동침하는 자는 저주를 받을 것이라 할 것이요 모든 백성은 아멘 할지니라

sentences.original_text: Cursed be he that lieth with his sister
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 누이와 동침하는 자는 저주를 받을지니

sentences.original_text: or the daughter of his mother
And all the people shall say
